title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 20.76 - Charges on overdue accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 20.76 - Charges on overdue accounts

State Regulations

Any unpaid obligation of a handler pursuant to sections
20.72 and
20.85
of this Part shall be
increased one percent on the first day after the due date of such obligation
and on the same day of each succeeding month until such obligation is
paid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
20.76

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
